intro: Manekia urbani, commonly known as the urban tree, is a tropical plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves that are typically dark green and glossy. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Its fruits are small berries that turn from green to red when mature. Manekia urbani is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ability to thrive in urban environments.
